name: 張文馨
objective: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman and Sophomore students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

Teaching Progress and Themes:
Week1 Instructions for teaching planning, including objectives, content, progress, knowledge base, and evaluation methods.
Week2 Yoga Asana Operation I
Week3 Yoga Asana Operation II
Week4 Yoga Asana Operation III
Week5 Kettlebell Operation - Turkish Get-Up
Week6 Kettlebell operation - upper limbs
Week7 Kettlebell operation - lower limbs
Week8 Cardiorespiratory Fitness - orienteering
Week9 Agility and Coordination - Rope Ladder Training 
Week10 Cardio boxing
Week11 TRX suspension operation - upper limbs
Week12 TRX suspension operation - lower limbs
Week13 TRX suspension operation - Integrate
Week14 Cardiorespiratory fitness - Balloon blow
Week15 Dance
Week16 Group TABATA
Week17 Final report and Final examination
Week18 Make-up Examination


Lesson Notes
1.　　Please wear clothing and sneakers suitable for physical activity during the class (jeans, skirts, slippers and high heels are strictly prohibited).
2.　　If you have any questions of physical discomfort or health conditions on the day, please be sure to inform the teacher so that other classes can be arranged.
3.　　For the sake of good health, try to finish your meals and come back to class, and bring your own boiling water.
4.　　Arrive and go to class on time, remember to bring water and a "towel" to change clothes as needed.
5.　　Please try not to bring valuables to avoid loss
scorePolicy:
A.　　Assignment10%: Sports Poster Design: Make posters for the subject of the course and write your experiences.
B.　　Compete in Groups20%: TABATA Group Competitions and Collaborative Scoring.
C.　　Skill Examinations30%: Hinge mobility；Turkish Get-Up；Balloon blow
D.　　Attendance and Learning Attitudes40%: According to the school process, 3 absentees will be deducted from the school.
